# setTransform(_:at:)

**Instance Method**

Sets the transform value at a time within the time range of the instruction.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func setTransform(_ transform: CGAffineTransform, at time: CMTime)
```

## Configuring the transform

- **addTransformRamp(_:)**: Sets a transform ramp to apply during a given time range.
- **transformRamp(at:)**: Obtains the transform ramp that includes a specified time.
